DOC.criteria: Women undergo fresh vitro fertilization treatment use egg donor egg . At least 18 year age . Total antral follicle count least 12 measure ultrasound prior stimulation . Basal FSH < 10 IU . At least 8 normally fertilize egg ( 2PN . ) Fertilization use ejaculate sperm ( fresh frozen ) surgically remove sperm . Willing comply study protocol procedure able speak English . Planned preimplantation genetic diagnosis preimplantation genetic screening . Gestational carrier . Use reinseminated egg .
